summary: Thousands of service members transition from military to civilian life each year. To help those who may need mental health support, DOD automatically enrolls service members who had a mental health appointment in the year prior to separation in its "inTransition" program. In 2022, inTransition identified 85% of its enrollees this way. But inTransition doesn't conduct outreach to these enrollees until 2-3 months after their...
title: DOD and VA Health Care: Actions Needed to Better Facilitate Access to Mental Health Services During Military to Civilian Transitions
